alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Screven (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 10:54AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HAZARDOUS SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SCREVEN AND BULLOCH COUNTIES... At 1052 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a hazardous shower capable of producing gusty winds over Dover, or 11 miles southwest of Sylvania, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this shower include... Sylvania, Hiltonia, Rocky Ford, Woodcliff, Altman, Hilltonia, Captolo and Dover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
